org.spongycastle.crypto.signers

Class NTRUSignerPrng

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongycastle.crypto.signers.NTRUSignerPrng

extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the deterministic pseudo-random generator in EESS section 3.7.3.1
